bug.short_desc: Bug when starting up with new 0.66 version
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Just upgraded to Zim 0.66 in Fedora 25, and now on every boot I get the following "Looks like you found a bug" text splat:
This is zim 0.66 Platform: posix Locale: en_US UTF-8 FS encoding: UTF-8 Python: (2, 7, 13, 'final', 0) Gtk: (2, 24, 31) Pygtk: (2, 24, 0) Zim revision is: branch: zim-trunk revision: 871 jaap.karssenberg@gmail.com-20170428103155-0xaqvtl2g53epq2y date: 2017-04-28 12:31:55 +0200
======= Traceback ======= File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/zim/actions.py", line 240, in do_activate self.__get__(instance, instance.__class__)() File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/zim/actions.py", line 211, in func self.func(instance, active) File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/zim/gui/__init__.py", line 2079, in toggle_panes Window.save_uistate(self) File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/zim/gui/widgets.py", line 2727, in save_uistate self.uistate[key] = self.get_pane_state(key) File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/zim/config/dicts.py", line 541, in __setitem__ raise KeyError('Config key "%s" has not been defined' % k) KeyError: 'Config key "right_pane" has not been defined'
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
0.66
How reproducible:
100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Start up zim
Actual results:
Splat
Expected results:
Used to start up fine with old Zim version
Additional info:
Can you update to 0.67-rc2 and have another try? https://kojipkgs.fedoraproject.org//work/tasks/6100/20016100/Zim-0.67-0.rc2.1.fc25.noarch.rpm

Yep, the bug I was experiencing no longer occurs with 0.67-rc2.
Thanks!
Zim-0.67-0.rc2.1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-0346adfee2
Zim-0.67-0.rc2.1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-34872be2a2
Zim-0.67-0.rc2.1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-830f0cb8f0

Zim-0.67-0.rc2.1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates.
